Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: getdate()

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: system_user

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
declare @Id table(Id int) insert into MessageTemplate ( [Name], [Text] ) OUTPUT inserted.Id into @Id SELECT @Name, @Text
RETURN (select top 1 Id from @Id)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
SELECT * from vwMessageTemplate where Id = @Id
RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
SELECT top 5000 * from vwMessageTemplate Order by Id desc
RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spMessageTemplate_List] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Delete from MessageTemplate where Id = @Id
RETURN @Id

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
update MessageTemplate set Name = @Name, Text = @Text where Id = @Id
RETURN @Id

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
declare @Id table(Id int) insert into SMS ( [Mobile], [Text] , [Date] , [DirectionId], [StatusId] , [User] ) OUTPUT inserted.Id into @Id SELECT @Mobile, @Text , case when @Date = '01/01/01' then GETDATE() else @Date end, @DirectionId, @StatusId, case when @User = '' then SYSTEM_USER when @User is null then SYSTEM_USER else @User end
RETURN (select top 1 Id from @Id)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
SELECT * from vwSMS where Id = @Id
RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
SELECT top 200 * from vwSMS where Mobile = @Id order by Id desc
RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
SELECT top 5000 * from vwSMS Order by Date desc
RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spSMS_List] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Delete from SMS where Id = @Id
RETURN @Id

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
update SMS set Mobile = @Mobile, Text = @Text , DirectionId = @DirectionId, StatusId = @StatusId, [User] = (case when @User = '' then SYSTEM_USER else @User end) where Id = @Id
RETURN @Id

Property.Name: HeaderContents
QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM MessageTemplate

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vwMessageTemplate] AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT s.*,d.Direction,st.Status FROM SMS s inner join Direction d on s.DirectionId = d.Id inner join Status st on s.StatusId = st.Id

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vwSMS] AS
